about.title: About NASK Nanofiber Technology
about.description: NASK's patented nanofiber technology represents a breakthrough in advanced material science, delivering a new generation of high-performance nonwoven solutions. Our nanofiber-enhanced substrates are engineered to surpass traditional materials by providing superior fluid management, exceptional breathability, enhanced antimicrobial functionality, and reliable long-term stability across diverse applications.
about.applications: Used in diapers, sanitary pads, medical respirators, and functional textiles, NASK nanofibers are produced using precise electrospinning processes developed and patented across China, the United States, Japan, Europe, and Hong Kong.

technology.title: Key Functional Advantages
technology.description: NASK's patented nanofiber technology represents a major advancement in applied material science. Built through precision electrospinning, our nanofiber layers form an ultra-fine network engineered to enhance the performance of nonwoven substrates across hygiene, medical, filtration, and industrial applications.

advantage1.title: Superior Fluid Dynamics
advantage1.description: Multiple hydrophilic channels provide rapid liquid relocation, controlled fluid transport, zero backflow behavior, and optimized distribution across the substrate.

advantage2.title: Antimicrobial Performance
advantage2.description: Eliminates >99% of bacteria and fungi through electrostatic attraction, hydrophobic interaction, and bacterial membrane disruption. Validated by AATCC 100-2019 standards.

advantage3.title: pH Regulation
advantage3.description: pH-balancing components restore and maintain healthy pH 5.5, preventing irritation and supporting the skin's natural resilience for sensitive applications.

advantage4.title: Active Ingredient Delivery
advantage4.description: Nanofiber structure stores and releases functional ingredients through mechanical interlockingâ€”enhanced stability, no preservatives needed, targeted release.

advantage5.title: Exceptional Breathability
advantage5.description: High water-vapor transmission through fiber network and micro-channels. Materials remain light, ventilated, and comfortable even under high humidity.

advantage6.title: Odor Neutralization
advantage6.description: Actively decomposes urea and ammoniaâ€”the primary sources of odorâ€”preserving freshness and maintaining a healthy micro-environment.

howItWorks.title: How NASK Nanofibers Are Made
howItWorks.subtitle: At the core of our platform is a highly controlled electrospinning process that deposits nanofibers uniformly onto a wide range of base substrates.

step1.title: Electrospinning
step1.description: Creating nanofibers with consistent diameter and morphology through precision-controlled electrical fields.

step2.title: Precision Coating
step2.description: Forming a stable nanofiber functional layer with uniform distribution across the substrate surface.

step3.title: Advanced Integration
step3.description: Bonding nanofibers to nonwoven materials without compromising breathability or softness.

howItWorks.result: The result: Materials with completely new performance capabilities

validation.title: Scientific & Laboratory Validation
validation.subtitle: All nanofiber top sheets have undergone testing by accredited laboratories
validation.test2: GB/T 28004-2021 â†’ Passed all diaper performance requirements
validation.test3: Dermatological Testing (SGS) â†’ Safe for sensitive skin

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about NASK nanofiber technology
faq.question1: What makes NASK nanofiber technology different?
faq.answer1: NASK's patented electrospinning process creates ultra-fine fibers with superior fluid management, breathability, and antimicrobial properties. Our technology is internationally patented across China, USA, Japan, Europe, and Hong Kong.
faq.question2: How does the antibacterial functionality work?
faq.answer2: Our nanofibers are engineered with antimicrobial properties that achieve >99% bacterial kill rate, as validated by AATCC 100-2019 testing. The technology provides long-lasting protection without compromising breathability.
faq.question3: Can NASK technology be integrated into existing production lines?
faq.answer3: Yes, our nanofiber layers are designed as ready-to-apply functional materials that can be easily integrated into existing manufacturing processes with minimal modifications.
faq.question4: What certifications does NASK technology have?
faq.answer4: Our products meet international standards including GB/T 28004-2021 for diaper performance, GB 15979-2002 for skin safety, and have passed dermatological testing by SGS for sensitive skin compatibility.
faq.question5: How can I request samples or technical specifications?
faq.answer5: Contact our team directly via email at monzer@sarabeelmedical.com or raghad@sarabeelmedical.com, or call +966 56 808 1744. We'll provide samples and detailed technical documentation.
